234 
235     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> Dict[str, Any]:
236         """Verify and decode JWT token"""
237         try:
238             payload = jwt.decode(
239                 token,
240                 self.jwt_secret,
241                 algorithms=[self.jwt_algorithm],
242             )
243 
244             # Verify token type
245             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
246                 raise jwt.InvalidTokenError("Invalid token type")
247 
248             return payload
249 
250         except jwt.ExpiredSignatureError:
251             raise HTTPException(
252                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
253                 detail="Token has expired",
254             )
255         except jwt.InvalidTokenError as e:
256             raise HTTPException(
257                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
258                 detail=f"Invalid token: {str(e)}",
259             )
